mapper.insert: insert into card_mst values( 0, #{user_id}, #{name}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{company_name}, #{part_name}, #{position_name}, now(), now() )
mapper.update: update card_mst set name = #{name}, phone = #{phone}, email = #{email}, company_name = #{company_name}, part_name = #{part_name}, position_name = #{position_name}, update_date = now() where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into card_group_mst values( 0, #{user_id}, #{group_name}, now(), now() )
mapper.select: SELECT cgm.group_name, COUNT(distinct cbg.card_id) AS card_count FROM card_group_mst cgm LEFT OUTER JOIN card_belong_group cbg ON(cbg.group_id = cgm.id) WHERE cgm.user_id = #{user_id} GROUP BY cgm.id
select cm.*, cgm.group_name from card_belong_group cbg LEFT OUTER JOIN card_mst cm ON(cm.id = cbg.card_id) LEFT OUTER JOIN card_group_mst cgm ON(cgm.id = cbg.group_id) where group_id = #{groupId}
mapper.update: update card_group_mst set group_name = #{group_name}, update_date = now() where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into card_belong_group values( 0, #{group_id}, #{card_id}, now(), now() )
